text: Andreas Rudolf Kisser (, born August 24, 1968 in São Bernardo do Campo, Brazil) is the lead guitarist for the metal band Sepultura as well as the rock supergroup HAIL!. == Discography == Pestilence * 1987 - Slaves of Pain (Demo) Sepultura * 1987 - Schizophrenia * 1989 - Beneath the Remains * 1991 - Arise * 1993 - Chaos A.D. * 1996 - Roots * 1998 - Against * 2001 - Nation * 2002 - Revolusongs * 2003 - Roorback * 2006 - Dante XXI * 2009 - A-Lex * 2011 - Kairos * 2013 - The Mediator Between Head and Hands Must Be the Heart * 2017 - Machine Messiah * 2020 - Quadra Quarteto da Pinga * 1995 - Demo Sexoturica * 1995 - SpermogoDemo (Demo) * 2003 - IR8 / Sexoturica Solo albums * 2009 - Hubris I & II === Appeared on the album as guest === Asesino * 2006 - Cristo Satánico Astafix * 2009 - End Ever Biohazard * 2001 - Uncivilization Burning in Hell * 2006 - Believe Claustrofobia * 2005 - Fulminant Korzus * 2004 - Ties of Blood Krusader * 2009 - Angus Nailbomb * 1994 - Point Blank Necromancia * 2001 - Check Mate Ratos de Porão * 1987 - Cada Dia Mais Sujo e Agressivo / Dirty and Aggressive Roadrunner United * 2005 - The All-Star Sessions Category:1968 births Category:Brazilian heavy metal guitarists Category:Living people Category:Sepultura members Category:Musicians from São Paulo Category:People from São Bernardo do Campo
title: Andreas Kisser
